TopicTitle: I want to make my voice like the kerbal man,what should I do?

Articles.Content:
I am planning to make ksp videos,so,if I could make my voice in the video like kerbal man,that will be wonderful and fun.

If you know relative mods and software,please tell me.

Thank you very much!

Hmmm, Kerbals speak reversed Spanish, pitch changed to be a bit higher, so you'd have to learn Spanish if you don't know it already.

You could then use a program like Audacity to reverse the audio and change the pitch

Step 1: Learn Spanish.

Step 2: Record your phrase in Spanish.

Step 3: Use Audio editing software to Reverse the recording.

Step 4: Use Audio editing software to increase the pitch of the recording - note do not change the pace of the recording.
